Fixability.ManualSteps:
1. Analise cada issue do linter
2. Corrija manualmente, entendendo o contexto
3. NÃO use golangci-lint run --fix (pode quebrar código)
4. Execute testes após cada correção

Examples: internal\config\tls_test.go:151:31: string `1.2` has 3 occurrences, but such constant `tlsVersion12` already exists (goconst)

internal\config\tls.go:24:2: structtag: struct field tag `yaml:"min_version" envconfig:"TLS_MIN_VERSION" default:tlsVersion12` not compatible with reflect.StructTag.Get: bad syntax for struct tag value (govet)

internal\security\tls.go:7:2: SA1019: "io/ioutil" has been deprecated since Go 1.19: As of Go 1.16, the same functionality is now provided by package [io] or package [os], and those implementations should be preferred in new code. See the specific function documentation for details. (staticcheck)
